divs: Sighting DetailsAs I sit here typing this, it is 2:40 am Monday, December 17th and from my window I can see one of the ufo's between the lodge and the resort at the lake. Today my son came for a visit. He and one of his roommates along with two others who live in Granisle and Tatchet watched the UFO's across the lake for quite a while this evening around 6pm. They were really very active. Later, not sure of the time, another person from Tatchet and a friend of his watched with us while we witnessed a white streak of light come out of the cloud and as it got close to the ground it split in two like a fork and appeared to land over by the mine. My husband contacted me and said he had a solid orb in his bathroom at the logging camp tonight. Tonight from home my family watched them at the lake on and off until 3 am Tuesday morning.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Granisle
There were 4 other sightings in Granisle on or around December 17th 2007
Summary: White light shoots across sky, splitting in two and lands near mine
